body:
As you can read in the message: Ninject does not support .NET Core. You can check it's website to be sure if there is no version that supports it.

.NET Core has its own Dependency Injection container build in. See here: http://www.inversionofcontrol.co.uk/asp-net-core-1-0-dependency-injection-what-is-is-and-what-it-is-not-2/
title: Ninject in .NET Core
